/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway is teeming with cars, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, the cityscape of Beijing unfolds, punctuated by buildings and trees. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
